description: two-digit code for state (commonly called a FIPS code)
Number of small businesses in the state (<500 employees) in 2017 (latest data available)
Number of people employed at small businesses in the state in 2017 (latest data available)
Total wages paid to small businesses in the state, in thousands in 2017 (latest data available)
Number of PPP loans made to small businesses in the state
Total value of PPP loans made to small businesses in the state
Percentage of small businesses in the state receiving PPP loans
Average amount of money provided per small business employee in state
